sentences.english: Offer all kinds of specific roasted eel prawn and fillet.
sentences.chinese: 供應各種規格的高品質烤鰻魚，對蝦，魚片。

sentences.english: Eels are relentless in their effort to return to their oceanic womb.
sentences.chinese: 鰻魚重返大海子宮的努力百折不撓。

sentences.english: Then one died trying to escape via the filter outflow.
sentences.chinese: 接着，有一條鰻魚在試圖通過濾網器出口逃跑時死了。

sentences.english: There "are" types of very closely related, known as the snake eel.
sentences.chinese: 有一個非常密切相關的物種的鰻魚被稱爲海鰻。

sentences.english: Thee eel is the eel li branch animal eel's meat or all.
sentences.chinese: 鰻魚爲鰻鱺科動物鰻魚的肉或全體。

sentences.english: Thee eel is the eel li branch animal eel's meat or all.
sentences.chinese: 鰻魚爲鰻鱺科動物鰻魚的肉或全體。

sentences.english: For much of my life I had little occasion to pay attention to eels.
sentences.chinese: 我的前半生很少有機會注意到鰻魚。

sentences.english: The loot feed and eel faces are the ma jor causes for pond water pollution.
sentences.chinese: 飼料散失和鰻魚糞便是造成水質污染的主要根源。

sentences.english: The eel slithered in and out of the sunken ship.
sentences.chinese: 這條鰻魚在這艘沉船裏遊進游出。

sentences.english: But did you ever try to keep an eel in bed?
sentences.chinese: 但是你有沒有試過把一條滑油油的鰻魚放到牀上？

sentences.english: In Kyoto, where there were fewer samurai, it is filleted along the belly.
sentences.chinese: 京都的武士很少，因此那裏是從魚肚片開鰻魚。

sentences.english: Year-old "glass" eels hole up in Maine's Pemaquid River.
sentences.chinese: 一歲大的“玻璃”鰻魚躲藏在緬因州的佩馬奎德河裏。

sentences.english: Jellied eels and Dornish reds filled their afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 滑溜溜的鰻魚和多恩紅酒消磨了午後時光。

sentences.english: Mix the eel sauce with ginger juice. Add fish cutlets, marinate for 2 to 3 hours.
sentences.chinese: 鰻魚汁與薑汁拌勻，將銀鱈魚放入，醃約2至3小時。

sentences.english: Eels are some of the favorite foods of the banded sea krait.
sentences.chinese: 鰻魚是巨環海蛇最喜愛的食物。

definition: tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
